titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the mine rescue team training credit.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the mine rescue team training credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through December 31, 2017, the income tax credit for mine rescue team training.
